org.drip.analytics.daycount

Class DateEOMAdjustment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.daycount.DateEOMAdjustment

  • public class DateEOMAdjustment
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the applicable adjustments for a given date pair. It exposes the following functionality: - Static Methods for creating 30/360, 30/365, and EOMA Date Adjustments - Export Anterior and Posterior EOM Adjustments
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
